Description: Lip, neck and handle sherd of East Greek (North Ionian) pottery krater; orange clay with some silver mica; interior: top of neck streaky brown with band of white-red-white stripes just below lip; on top of broad lip maeander band, on edge blobs; exterior: cream slip; in panel to right of spool handle, pendent lotus flower and bud chain with red patches buds and alternate petals of flowers.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.509)
